name: Substitutemarine
description:
Hello and welcome to Substitutemarine where you can switch between 2 submarines to clear levels. In order to clear a level, you must collect all the coins in the level. The orange submarine can collect the coins, and the black submarine can shoot certain enemies and  terrian.  However, both submarines have a JOINED TOGETHER fuel source, so be quick!

Controls:

Arrows keys to move

Left Mouse Button to switch submarines

Space to Shoot
